notes: Processes silicate and oxide raw materials into advanced ceramics, semiconductor-grade compounds, and megastructure-class structural matrix.
throughput_mult scales how quickly a batch completes relative to the recipe's base build_time_s.
efficiency is the fraction of listed input materials consumed per batch; values below 1.0 represent material savings from process optimization.
max_recipe_tier is the highest min_tech_tier recipe this unit can process.
max_concurrent_recipes is the number of recipe slots that can run in parallel.
